Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) bụ ikike ụgbọ elu nke Naịjirịa
Na afọ 2014, Onye isi ndi NCAA bu Captain  Muhktar Usman.
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya (Corporate Headquarters) dị na ala nke Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport na isi obodo Naịjirịa, Abuja
O nwere ọfịs mpaghara na Murtala Muhammed International Airport na Ikeja Lagos State, na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Port Harcourt International Airport na Port Harcoort, na Kano.
